error.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again!

web.unauthenticated: You should be authenticated to perform this action

client.connection: Something is wrong with your connection to the server or internet

server.unreacheable: Can't connect to the server — the server is unreacheable

proofspace.config: Can't sync Proofspace integration configuration from the server

authenticated.only: Organization integration will work only for authenticated user

auth.failed: Failed to authenticate user of integrated service in the voting system

integration.configured: Integration isn't configured on this site
integration.general: Integration of voting system with the current site stoped working
integration.role: No user role returned from the voting system

census.no: You can't publish a poll with an empty or without a census
census.notpublished: You can't publish the poll until the census is published
census.create: No create method in Vocdoni voting strategy
census.register: No create register in Vocdoni voting strategy
census.check: No check method in Vocdoni voting strategy
census.publish: No publish method in Vocdoni voting strategy

proofspace.error: Proofspace failed to support this action

qr.auth: Can't render QR code of authentication
qr.register: Can't render QR code of authentication

not.started: The poll isn't started - you can't vote in a poll that isn't started
not.defined: The poll isn't linked to poll service — you can't vote in the poll that doesn't really exist

poll.noproof: Something really wrong happened with your process. Please, contant support with error code: noproof

multiproof.support: Current voting application version doesn't support multiproof votings

proof.malformed: The voting you try to participate is malformed, please contant support!

poll.unknown: Some went wrong with the poll
poll.no: No poll to show information about
poll.casted: You already casted a vote in this poll
poll.registration: You can authorize for the poll only during the registration or voting

answers.malformed: Your vote is malformed - the ballot is broken. You can't vote this way

validator.missed: Your credentials don't satify requirements for participation in this voting. Please, read the guide for the voting.

unallowed.country: Voter from this country is unallowed
unallowed.age: You need to be at least 18 years old to participate in this voting

error.subtitle: Something went wrong
error.connection: Failed to connect to voting service!
error.credWallet: Proofpsace can't authenticate your wallet or credentials!
error.integrationUnauthorized: Your organization manager hasn't registered your organization into voting system!
error.default: Ups! We don't know what has happened!

choice.title: Welcome to New Belarus Voting
choice.subtitle: Your safe and secure polls and votings

result.error: During authentication process somehting unexpected happened!
During authentication process somehting unexpected happened!

step1.title: Authentication — step 1
step1.walletWhy: To use the voting system you need to load a voting key (profile) from Proofpsace credentials wallet. It's required for both voting and managing polls.
step1.scan: Scan the QR code with Proofspace application to load your voting key (profile).
step1.download: You can scan the QR code with your phone to download the Proofspace wallet app, or use the download links below.

stepper.descr1: Scan QR code with your Proofspace wallet containing voting key (profile)
stepper.descr2: Recall password from your voting profile. It was created during first registration in the server. Unfortunatly it can't be restored.

step1.title: Registration — step 1
step1.walletWhy: To use the voting system you need to create a voting key (profile) into Proofpsace credentials wallet. It's required for both voting and managing polls.
step1.scan: Scan the QR code with Proofspace application to create your voting key (profile).
step1.download: You can scan the QR code with your phone to download the Proofspace wallet app, or use the download links below.

stepper.descr1: Setup Proofspace application and add there your new voting profile.
stepper.descr2: Create a cryptographic password for your voting profile.

why.cause: To manage your data in decentralized voting system you need a voting key (profile).
why.proofspace: Your voting profile will be stored into your Proofspace wallet instead of our service.
why.pincode: To make your voting profile absolutely secured, pleased provide password / pincode. It will encrypt your voting profile and key.
why.precaution: We won't store your password anywhere, and it will be imposible to restore it.
why.remember: PLEASE REMEMBER YOUR PASSWORD! It's not recoverable!

error.broken: Incorrect password or keystore is broken

why.cause: You loaded your voting profile from your Proofspace wallet
why.pincode: Use the password (pincode) you remember to open (decipher) your voting profile
why.caution: You should recall your password, cause it can't be restored!

why.main: This voting requires you to authorize via telegram. If you see this window, you need to:
why.primary: Look for the pincode from Telegram Bot, if you get here using the bot;
why.secondary: Or open Telegram bot with this link and start from there:

pin.label: Pin-code
pin.hint: Enter pin-code from Telegram bot here

error.minLengh: Pin-code should be at least 4 symobls
error.maxLengh: Pin-code should be at max 9 symobls
error.wrong: Wrong pincode provided! You can try to get a valid pincode via a voting bot!

howto.title: Additional steps to proceed
howto.subheader: You succesfully created a voting key, but following setps required additional credentials. Please follow the guildlines bellow.

choice.title: Welcome to New Belarus Voting
choice.subtitle: Your safe and secure polls and votings

result.error: During authentication process somehting unexpected happened!
During authentication process somehting unexpected happened!

step1.title: Authorization — step 1
step1.walletWhy: To proceed you need to proove that you have required Proofspace credential and voting key.
step1.scan: Scan the QR code with Proofspace application to load required crednetials and voting key.
step1.download: You can scan the QR code with your phone to download the Proofspace wallet app, or use the download links below.

stepper.descr1: Scan QR code with your Proofspace wallet containing voting key and required credentials
stepper.descr2: Recall password from your voting profile. It was created during first registration in the server. Unfortunatly it can't be restored.

step1.title: Registration — step 1
step1.walletWhy: To use the voting system you need to create a voting key (profile) into Proofpsace credentials wallet. It's required for both voting and managing polls.
step1.scan: Scan the QR code with Proofspace application to create your voting key (profile).
step1.download: You can scan the QR code with your phone to download the Proofspace wallet app, or use the download links below.

why.proofspace: Your voting profile will be stored into your Proofspace wallet instead of our service.
why.pincode: To make your voting profile absolutely secured, pleased provide password / pincode. It will encrypt your voting profile and key.

why.main: This voting requires you to authorize via telegram. If you see this window, you need to:
why.primary: Get Telegram ID authorization from our Telegram Bot
why.secondary: You can open it following this link:

veriff.header: You are in a dangerous country!
veriff.intro: Please, use VPN to authorize with a physical ID
veriff.vpn: We care about your safety, so we can't allow you to proceed, until we sure that you use VPN
veriff.vpn-desktop: Use VPN both on this device and your mobile phone.
veriff.vpn-mobile: To proceed, install VPN on your mobile phone too. Also avoid getting authorization link on your phone via SMA.

info.title: You need to authorize your vote
info.guide: Fallow the link to learn more about how to participate in the election

proofspace.title: Use Proofspace ID Wallet
proofspace.download: Install Proofspace ID Wallet to digitalize your passport and vote on web and mobile from this site

newbelarus.title: Belarus ID Wallet
newbelarus.download: Install Belarus ID Wallet to digitalize your passport and vote on mobile in the same app

telegram.title: Telegram Identity Verification
telegram.info: Go through Telegram identity verification. Right now only those who submit their 2020 election balot to Golos Bot will be authorized to vote

webpass.title: Physical Passport Authorization
webpass.info: You may authorize your vote right here using web browser on your mobile phone. Please, proceed with voting to do it.
